## GO Enrichment
---

To obtain your associated GO terms and description in a nice table and graph, just choose your organism.



-  <u> As input </u> </br>
Paste a list of <b> gene ids </b> of interest (EnsemblIDs)



- <u> GO Terms </u> </br>
Choose a p-value cut-off and the GO enrichment you want to obtain.


<br/>
<br/>

 <u>About the p-value adjustment :</u> 

[Why, When and How to Adjust Your P Values ?](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6099145/) : p-value quantification issues occurs when multtesting. <br/>
Indeeed, in multitesting, the probability of false positive may inflate, so it would need an adjustemnt to correct this inflation.
